      • setClusterEnergyHigh

        public void setClusterEnergyHigh(double clusterEnergyHigh)
        Sets the highest allowed energy a cluster may have and still pass the cluster total energy single cluster cut. Value uses units of GeV.
        Parameters:
        clusterEnergyHigh - - The parameter value.

      • setClusterEnergyLow

      • setPairCoincidence

        public void setPairCoincidence(int pairCoincidence)
        Sets the time range over which cluster pairs will be formed. Value uses units of clock-cycles. Note that the number of clock-cycles used is calculated as (2 * pairCoincidence) + 1.
        Parameters:
        pairCoincidence - - The parameter value.

      • setSeedEnergyHigh

        public void setSeedEnergyHigh(double seedEnergyHigh)
        Sets the highest allowed energy a seed hit may have and still pass the seed hit energy single cluster cut. Value uses units of GeV.
        Parameters:
        seedEnergyHigh - - The parameter value.

      • setSeedEnergyLow

        Parameters:
        seedEnergyLow - - The parameter value.

      • setEnergySlopeParamF

        public void setEnergySlopeParamF(double f)
        Sets the value of F in the energy slope equation E_min + R_min * F.
        Parameters:
        f - - The new energy slope parameter.

      • getClusterPairsTopBot

        protected List<Cluster[]> getClusterPairsTopBot()
        Get a list of all unique cluster pairs in the event.
        Returns:
        A List collection of Cluster objects containing all cluster pairs.

      • getTimeDisplacement

        protected double getTimeDisplacement()
        Description copied from class: ReadoutDriver
        Specifies the amount of simulation time that the driver needs to produce its output. This indicates that the driver's present output was generated based on input a time equal to (getCurrentTime() - getTimeDisplacement()).
        Specified by:
        getTimeDisplacement in class ReadoutDriver
        Returns:
        Returns the time displacement of output data as a double.

      • getTimeNeededForLocalOutput

        protected double getTimeNeededForLocalOutput()
        Description copied from class: ReadoutDriver
        Specifies the amount of simulation time that the driver needs to produce special on-trigger data.
        Specified by:
        getTimeNeededForLocalOutput in class ReadoutDriver
        Returns:
        Returns the time displacement of output data as a double.

      • getGoodClusters

        private Collection<Cluster> getGoodClusters(Collection<Cluster> clusters)

      • testTrigger

        private boolean testTrigger()
        Tests all of the current cluster pairs for triggers.
        Returns:
        Returns true if one of the cluster pairs passes all of the cluster cuts and false otherwise.

      • updateClusterQueues

        private void updateClusterQueues(Collection<Cluster> clusterList)
        Adds clusters from a new event into the top and bottom cluster queues so that they may be formed into pairs.
        Parameters:
        clusterList - - The clusters to add to the queues.
